Hi,

I just finished to look at logs from my last crawl. I used the 
QuotaE=
nforcer to limit the number of urls from host to a certain 
values. Since I=
 set it as a prefetcher, the crawl.logs show a lot of -
5003 status code. T=
hat's fine! Now, can I use QuotaEnforcer in the post-
processor stage (befo=
re Scheduler) so that those url exceeding limits 
won't even be scheduled? =
That will save time to my crawl.

Thanks
Barabasy
